### Publically avaliable data sets

NMFS-collected passive acoustic data is archived and publically available via the [NCEI Passive Acoustic Data Viewer](https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/maps/passive-acoustic-data/). 

Select '**NOAA PIFSC**' as the Source Organization and '**Glider**' as the Platform Type to find our archived datasets

### Interacting with netCDF files

Handy online viewer: [myhdf5](https://myhdf5.hdfgroup.org/)
